channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: 'Pluribus' star Rhea Seehorn says no thanks to a world dictated by group think
item.description: In the Apple TV series, Seehorn stars as a woman named Carol who suddenly finds herself surrounded by people who are inexplicably happy. The only problem: Carol's not interested in joining them.
item.content:encoded: In the Apple TV series, Seehorn stars as a woman named Carol who suddenly finds herself surrounded by people who are inexplicably happy. The only problem: Carol's not interested in joining them.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross

item.title: Believe it or not, this book makes taxes fascinating
item.description: The Price of Democracy tells the history of taxation from colonization to the present day. It's essential reading for anyone who cares about preserving democracy.
item.content:encoded: The Price of Democracy tells the history of taxation from colonization to the present day. It's essential reading for anyone who cares about preserving democracy.
item.dc:creator: Ericka Taylor

item.title: Jazz, joy and one ragged Christmas tree: 60 years of 'A Charlie Brown Christmas'
item.description: On Dec. 9, 1965, "A Charlie Brown Christmas" premiered on television. In 1995, Peanuts creator Charles Schulz spoke with NPR's Bob Edwards on Morning Edition.
item.content:encoded: On Dec. 9, 1965, "A Charlie Brown Christmas" premiered on television. In 1995, Peanuts creator Charles Schulz spoke with NPR's Bob Edwards on Morning Edition.
item.dc:creator: Bob Edwards

item.title: How a member of HR helped a woman diagnosed with breast cancer
item.description: When Gillian Kline was diagnosed with breast cancer, she had one day to figure out a health insurance plan at her workplace. She didn't know what to do — until HR team member Alex Mackey got involved.
item.content:encoded: When Gillian Kline was diagnosed with breast cancer, she had one day to figure out a health insurance plan at her workplace. She didn't know what to do — until HR team member Alex Mackey got involved.

item.title: 'Placeless' author traces the roots and realities of mass homelessness in America
item.description: Patrick Markee spent two decades walking through New York City's tunnels, armories and intake centers. His book asks: what if homelessness isn't a personal failing, but the result of policy choices?
item.content:encoded: Patrick Markee spent two decades walking through New York City's tunnels, armories and intake centers. His book asks: what if homelessness isn't a personal failing, but the result of policy choices?
item.dc:creator: Tonya Mosley

item.title: Maureen Corrigan's 10 favorite books of 2025 — with plenty for nonfiction lovers
item.description: Fresh Air's book critic says her picks tilt a bit to nonfiction, but the novels that made the cut redress the imbalance by their sweep and intensity. Karen Russell's The Antidote was her favorite.
item.content:encoded: Fresh Air's book critic says her picks tilt a bit to nonfiction, but the novels that made the cut redress the imbalance by their sweep and intensity. Karen Russell's The Antidote was her favorite.
item.dc:creator: Maureen Corrigan

item.title: Not so fast, Netflix. Paramount launches hostile bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount has launched a hostile bid for the company that's home to Casablanca, Batman and CNN. Just Friday, Netflix and Warner Brothers executives were celebrating a deal they had struck.
item.content:encoded:
Paramount has launched a hostile bid for the company that's home to Casablanca, Batman and CNN. Just Friday, Netflix and Warner Brothers executives were celebrating a deal they had struck. 

(Image credit: Evan Agostini/Evan Agostini/Invision/AP)
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: Here are the 2026 Golden Globe nominations
item.description: Marlon Wayans and Skye P. Marshall presented the nominees for the 83rd Golden Globes this morning. The awards ceremony will be held on Jan. 11, hosted by Nikki Glaser.
item.content:encoded:
Marlon Wayans and Skye P. Marshall presented the nominees for the 83rd Golden Globes this morning. The awards ceremony will be held on Jan. 11, hosted by Nikki Glaser.

(Image credit: Patrick T. Fallon)
item.dc:creator: Beth Novey

item.title: Trump hosts the Kennedy Center Honors celebrating KISS, Sylvester Stallone and more
item.description: Sunday's Kennedy Center Honors ceremony was the first since Donald Trump became the Chair of the Board of Trustees. KISS, Sylvester Stallone and George Strait were among the honorees.
item.content:encoded: Sunday's Kennedy Center Honors ceremony was the first since Donald Trump became the Chair of the Board of Trustees. KISS, Sylvester Stallone and George Strait were among the honorees.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong

item.title: Tributes, not politics, play center stage as Trump hosts the Kennedy Center Honors
item.description: President Trump said he was closely involved with picking the honorees, and on Sunday he became the first president to host the Kennedy Center awards ceremony.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump said he was closely involved with picking the honorees, and on Sunday he became the first president to host the Kennedy Center awards ceremony.

(Image credit: Kevin Wolf)
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong
